name: Quality Docs Finder
description: Helps QA analysts quickly find specifications, standards, SOPs, supplier quality records, and compliance documentation.

friction_addressed.description: Finding specifications, standards, SOPs, test methods, and quality records
Locating certifications, calibration records, and audit documentation
Finding supplier quality records, certifications, and performance history

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster access to quality documentation and compliance records

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to SOPs, specifications, quality records, supplier documentation, and compliance files
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) SOPs and work instructions, (2) specifications and standards, (3) supplier quality records, (4) compliance and certification documents, (5) calibration records

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to quality management systems via Graph connectors
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for QMS or document control systems

actions.description: This agent retrieves information but does not modify documents, update records, or approve quality decisions.

conversation_starters.title: Supplier quality
conversation_starters.text: Find the quality records for supplier [name]

conversation_starters.title: Audit documents
conversation_starters.text: Find documents for the upcoming [audit type] audit

conversation_starters.title: Standard reference
conversation_starters.text: What does [standard, e.g., ISO 9001] require for [topic]?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with quality documentation
SOPs and work instructions accessible via SharePoint

data_not_accessed: Live QMS data (unless Graph connector configured)
admin_considerations: Keep SOPs current with document control process
Review sensitivity of supplier quality records
Maintain calibration records in accessible location
